trans-unit.source: Represents settings that define operational characteristics of a channel cache.
trans-unit.target: Representa as configurações que definem as características operacionais de um cache de canal.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings> instância.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings> instance.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum interval of time for which the object can remain idle in the cache before being disposed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o intervalo de tempo máximo para o qual o objeto pode permanecer ocioso no cache antes de ser descartado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.IdleTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.IdleTimeout%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the interval of time after which an object is removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o intervalo de tempo após o qual um objeto é removido do cache.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.LeaseTimeout%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.LeaseTimeout%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets the maximum number of objects that can be in the cache.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número máximo de objetos que podem estar no cache.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ChannelCacheSettings.MaxItemsInCache%2A> propriedade.
